chapters.title: Chapter 19:  Surprises
chapters.info:
Kwamesa,
      p. 459 (553)â€”Sitter for the
      Gray Ajah, the youngest Sitter in the Hall of the Little Tower.  She is
      dark and slender, has a sharp nose, and has strength in the Power;
      she is on the same level as Sheriam.
      She tries to seem tall even though she is not.
      She grew up in Arafel, and she seems to put great
      store in ceremony.  She is far too young to be a Sitter, at least
      normally.
